Module com.github.robtimus.junit.support
Package com.github.robtimus.junit.support.test.io

Interface ReaderTests

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReaderTests.MarkResetTests, ReaderTests.ReadCharTests, ReaderTests.ReadIntoCharArrayPortionTests, ReaderTests.ReadIntoCharArrayTests, ReaderTests.ReadIntoCharBufferTests, ReaderTests.ReadyTests, ReaderTests.SkipTests, ReaderTests.TransferToTests
    public interface ReaderTests
    Base interface for testing separate Reader functionalities.
    Author:
    Rob Spoor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  ReaderTests.MarkResetTests
      Contains tests for Reader.mark(int) and Reader.reset().
      static interface  ReaderTests.ReadCharTests
      Contains tests for Reader.read().
      static interface  ReaderTests.ReadIntoCharArrayPortionTests
      Contains tests for Reader.read(char[], int, int).
      static interface  ReaderTests.ReadIntoCharArrayTests
      Contains tests for Reader.read(char[]).
      static interface  ReaderTests.ReadIntoCharBufferTests
      Contains tests for Reader.read(CharBuffer).
      static interface  ReaderTests.ReadyTests
      Contains tests for Reader.ready().
      static interface  ReaderTests.SkipTests
      Contains tests for Reader.skip(long).
      static interface  ReaderTests.TransferToTests
      Contains tests for Reader.transferTo(Writer).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String expectedContent()
      Returns the expected content from created readers.
      Reader reader()
      Returns the reader to test.

    • Method Detail

      • reader

        Reader reader()
        Returns the reader to test.

        This method will be called only once for each test. This makes it possible to initialize the reader in a method annotated with BeforeEach, and perform additional tests after the pre-defined test has finished.

        Returns:
        The reader to test.

      • expectedContent

        String expectedContent()
        Returns the expected content from created readers.
        Returns:
        The expected content.
